menu.skylper.config.name: skylper
menu.skylper.config.auto.overlay.x.title: X coordinate
menu.skylper.config.auto.overlay.y.title: Y coordinate
menu.skylper.config.auto.overlay.enabled: Decides whether the overlay is shown or not.
menu.skylper.config.auto.overlay.x.descr: Changes the x coordinate of the overlay. It can also be changed visually by using the button in the General category.
menu.skylper.config.auto.overlay.y.descr: Changes the y coordinate of the overlay. It can also be changed visually by using the button in the General category.
menu.skylper.config.general.title: General
menu.skylper.config.general.hud.title: Modify HUD
menu.skylper.config.hollows.title: Crystal Hollows
menu.skylper.config.hollows.chest_highli: Decides whether to highlight treasure chests or not.
Decides the color a treasure chest should be highlighted in.
menu.skylper.config.hollows.auto_pass_re: Decides whether the pass, which grants access to the Crystal Hollows, should be automatically renewed or not.
menu.skylper.config.hollows.metal_detect: Toggles the metal detector helper in Mines of Divan.
menu.skylper.config.hollows.locations.de: Settings about the structure location recognition in public chats.
menu.skylper.config.hollows.locations.pa: Decides whether to recognize locations sent in public chat.
menu.skylper.config.hollows.locations.au: Decides whether to automatically add locations, which are recognized in messages sent in public chat.
menu.skylper.config.hollows.waypoints.de: Change which waypoints should be shown in the Crystal Hollows
menu.skylper.config.hollows.waypoints.wa: Decides whether the %d waypoint should be shown.
menu.skylper.config.hollows.crystal_over: Changes preferences about the Crystal Overlay, which shows the status of the crystals needed for a nucleus run.
menu.skylper.config.hollows.tracker_over: Powder Grinding Tracker
Changes preferences about the Powder Grinding Tracker, which shows stats about your powder grinding session.
Opened chests
Decides whether the count of opened chests should be visible in the widget.
Farmed Gemstone
Decides whether the amount of farmed gemstone powder should be visible in the widget.
Farmed Gemstone per minute
Decides whether the amount of farmed gemstone powder per minute should be visible in the widget.
Farmed Gemstone per hour
Decides whether the amount of farmed gemstone powder per hour should be visible in the widget.
Farmed Mithril powder
Decides whether the amount of farmed mithril powder should be visible in the widget.
Farmed Mithril per minute
Decides whether the amount of farmed mithril powder per minute should be visible in the widget.
Farmed Mithril per hour
Decides whether the amount of farmed mithril powder per hour should be visible in the widget.
Double Powder event
Toggles whether the state of the Double Powder event in the Crystal Hollows should be visible in the widget.
Session duration
Toggles whether the duration of the current session should be displayed in the widget.
menu.skylper.tabhud.modifier.title: Modify HUD
menu.skylper.tabhud.modifier.caption: Drag the widgets to reorder them.
menu.skylper.hollows.tabhud.stats.title: Powder Grinding
chat.skylper.hollows.locations.pick: Click to select %d for this coordinates!
chat.skylper.hollows.command.no_internal: No matching waypoint could be found for this key!
chat.skylper.hollows.solver.metaldetecto: The metal detector solver has failed! Try another location!
Solver found %d solutions! Try another location!
